title: Riding out a Market Correction, Xerox & HP’s $35B Ink Cartridges Fight
itunes:title: Riding out a Market Correction, Xerox & HP’s $35B Ink Cartridges Fight
description:
Doug Ramsey, CIO of the Leuthold Group, discusses riding out a market correction and says we could be headed for a bear market. Bloomberg News Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli talks about the South Carolina primary and the Trump administration's handling of the coronavirus. Bloomberg News Tech Reporter Austin Carr provides his insight on Xerox and HP’s $35 billion fight over ink cartridges. Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Tara Lachapelle breaks down Clorox beating 99% of stocks. And we Drive to the Close with Brad McMillan, CIO at Commonwealth Financial Network.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
